name: GetToolLocationWorldTransform

returns.name: location
returns.desc: Transform of a tool location in world space or nil if the location is not found or if there is no visible tool body.

description: Return transform of a tool location in world space. Locations can be defined using the tool prefab editor. A tool location is defined in tool space and to get the world space transform a tool body is required.
If a tool body does not exist this function will return nil.
